original_text: The other things that happened while Shallum was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of Israel's kings’. It tells about the plan that he made to kill King Zechariah.
korean_text: 살룸의 남은 사적과 그가 반역한 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Shallum was king
sentences.korean_translation: 살룸이 왕으로 있을 때 일어난 다른 일들은

sentences.original_text: that he made to kill King Zechariah
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 스가랴 왕을 죽이기 위해 만든
